Plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.
Title: A Night at the Roxbury
Writer: Steve Koren, Will Ferrell, Chris Kattan
Actors: Will Ferrell, Chris Kattan, Raquel Gardner, Viveca Paulin
tomatoConsensus: Has the same problems as the worst SNL movies: one-note characters and plots unreasonably stretched to feature length runtime.
